slip knot and not pull it tight or follow these instructions £ make a loop with the yarn and hold it with one hand £ with the other hand put 2 fingers inside the loop and make a triangle with the yarn £ twist/flip the hand with the 2 fingers inside the loop so that it creates a loop in each corner of the triangle £ lie the yarn down on the table and gently remove your hands £ put the loop that s
